title: The Invisible Weapon, Ran's First Investigation

infobox.Title:: The Invisible Weapon, Ran's First Investigation
infobox.Japanese title:: 見えない凶器 蘭の初推理  (Mienai Kyōki Ran no Hatsu-suiri)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Sonoko Suzuki  Kogoro Mouri  Shinichi Kudo  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Junko Yamanaka and Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa, Next Conan's Hint  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri, Next Conan's Hint  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Naoko Matsui as Sonoko Suzuki  Yūko Kobayashi as Chie Yoshino  Jurota Kosugi as Akio Yoshino  Junichi Sugawara as Engineer  Takayuki Inoue as Clerk A  Isshin Chiba as Clerk B

sections.Situation: Ran and Sonoko befriend a couple at a restaurant, but Ran finds the man's act suspicious. The next day Ran takes Conan and Sonoko to their house, Ran learns that the man's wife has an extremely expensive insurance and that he may be trying to wear her body out to kill her.
sections.People:
- Victim (car crash - injured)
- 31 years old
- Flower designer
- 33 years old
- Insurance company employee
- Chie's husband
- Chie's friend and co-worker
- Florist
sections.Trivia:
- Chie Yoshino's car is a 1997 venetian pearl red Toyota Caldina Gt−T Active Sports [T210G]. The license plate number is 新宿 55, さ 35-80 (Shinjuku 55, Sa 35-80).
- Akio Yoshino's dream vehicle is a Rosso Corsa Ferrari 550 Maranello in which the price is 25,000,000 ¥.
